title: Scholar Transport Must Be Prioritised During Transport Month (IFP - Inkatha Freedom Party)
text: ( Source : IFP - Inkatha Freedom Party ) The IFP has challenged the KZN Provincial Government to prioritise scholar transport as October is transport month and education is central to social advancement. 'If we speak about transport month we
